job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Business Administration, or related field

jd: From: bhuwan tiwari, Sonitalentcorp bhuwan.tiwari@sonitalentcorp.com Reply to: bhuwan.tiwari@sonitalentcorp.com Job Role: GenAI Program Manager Duration: 6 months+Location: Hybrid Sacramento, CAVisa: USC, GC, EAD only Interview: Video Note: Candidates must have a LinkedIn profile with a picture anyone without will be rejected DescriptionWe are seeking a GenAI Program Manager for a hybrid assignment working 2 days/wk on-site with our Sacramento Based client. In this role you will oversee the entire GenAI implementation program, coordinating activities across different teams and stakeholders. This senior-level position requires a blend of project management expertise, strategic thinking, and leadership skills. Key Responsibilities:Lead and execute complex GenAI implementation programsDevelop and maintain project plans, timelines, and budgetsCoordinate activities across different teams and stakeholdersManage risks and issues, ensuring timely resolutionReport project progress to senior managementDrive client satisfaction through effective communication and solution deliveryIdentify and propose process improvements and automation opportunitiesEngage with executives to drive value-based solution discussionsContribute to business development efforts and proposal creationDemonstrate thought leadership in GenAI implementation and team integration Required Qualifications:10+ years of experience in program management, with at least 5 years focus on technology implementation projects5+ years in consulting or senior leadership rolesStrong understanding of AI and machine learning conceptsProven track record in designing and implementing large-scale technology solutions using industry best practicesExperience in change management and stakeholder engagementExpertise in risk management and mitigation strategiesStrong executive presentation and communication skillsPMP or similar project management certification Preferred Qualifications:Experience in AI or machine learning implementationsRelevant industry certifications (e.g., AI/ML certifications, Agile methodologies)Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Business Administration, or related fieldMulti-domain project experience solving complex organizational challengesProven consulting experience with a focus on client engagement Thanks, Bhuwan TiwariSr.Technical Recruiter SoniTalent Corporation I5404 Merribrook Lan--e, Prospect, KY, USA Cell -859-946-4062 | bhuwan.tiwari@sonitalentcorp.com
